entry.Sun: When it finds a trace of its prey, it patiently stakes out the location...but it’s always snoozing by nightfall.
entry.Moon: It adores having Rattata and Raticate for dinner, but as it’s diurnal, it never encounters them. This Pokémon boasts incredible patience.

SunMoon: Route 10, 11, 14, 15, 16, 17, Akala Outskirts, Tapu Village, Malie City, Poni Wilds, Ancient Poni Path, Poni Grove, Poni Plains, Poni Gauntlet
